name: PATCH_tracking_settings-click
description:
**This endpoint allows you to enable or disable your current click tracking setting.**

Click Tracking overrides all the links and URLs in your emails and points them to either SendGridâ€™s servers or the domain with which you branded your link. When a customer clicks a link, SendGrid tracks those [clicks](https://sendgrid.com/docs/glossary/clicks/).

Click tracking helps you understand how users are engaging with your communications. SendGrid can track up to 1000 links per email

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

enabled.description: The setting you want to use for click tracking.

$ul: **enable_text**: Indicates if click tracking is enabled for plain text emails.
**enabled**: Indicates if click tracking is enabled or disabled.
